column34: Dec 4 Yahoo Inc's board of directors on Friday is in the third and final day of meetings that could decide the future of one of Silicon Valley's most prominent but troubled companies.   SAN FRANCISCO/BENGALURU An activist investor on Thursday renewed its push for Yahoo Inc  to abandon its plans to spin off its valuable stake in Chinese e-commerce giant Alibaba Group Holding Ltd  and instead sell its core business "at the highest price possible."Yahoo board in final talks on fate of core businessDeals of the day- Mergers and acquisitionsUPDATE 1-Yahoo board in final talks on future of company SAN FRANCISCO
